attributes.action: arrange it so that the Irish singing turkey competes and wins the Eurovision Final
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's outrageous that Irelands Eurovision entry of the singing turkey puppet didn't even make it through the semi final. 
The government should intervene and arrnge for this song to be put through to the final

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
